      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collector collector()
      User supplied Collector to add to the scan in addition to the standard group,interval,values,etc
      long end()
      Timestamp to end scan range (the largest timestamp), expresed in millisecond epoch
      Fields fields()
      Field names and values to filter on.
      Filter filter()
      User supplied Filter to add to the scan in addition to any implied filters on timestamps, particles, and fields
      Function function()
      Aggregation function for result's 'values' field.
      java.lang.String[] groups()
      Result groupings on particles
      ScanID ID()
      TODO: How to not need all three of these? Non-unique ID for this scan
      Interval interval()
      Date range interval to bucket results If non-null, scan results are bucketed into date ranges using the {#getFunction()} aggreagate function If null, scan results are atom-in-time values
      java.lang.String name()
      The measurement name to scan for

      Tag names and values to filter on.

        public Function function()
        Description copied from interface: Scan
        Aggregation function for result's 'values' field. If non-null, scan results are aggreagate values. If null, scan results will have raw measurement values
        Specified by:
